title.rendered: New Name and Logo for Pelican Rouge

content.rendered:
Autobar Group Ltd. engages in roasting and blending, packaging, and vending coffee in the United Kingdom and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1925 and is based in London, United Kingdom. Autobar Group Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Charden International B.V.

Pelican Rouge‘s history dates back to the nineteenth-century Belgium, Antwerp. In the year 1863 Josef van Leckwijck and his sons were the first to trade roasted coffee. With this complete new formula the Pelican Rouge brand quickly evolved into a mark for consistent and high quality coffee.

Today Pelican Rouge is the leader of coffee solutions across Europe through multiple channels. Every day we serve 7 million coffee lovers their favourite cup with the purpose of making their day as rewarding as possible. We work with a dedicated customer support network across 13 countries to deliver on our promises. As we control the product from bean to cup, we are determined to bring you the perfect coffee experience using the latest technologies.
